item.title: [40k] Ravener
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Flash

Ravenous (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.)

Whenever Ravener enters the battlefield, target creature attacks target opponent this turn if able.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTvU04n4dVo

item.title: [40k] Mawloc
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Ravenous (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.)

Terror from the Deep — When Mawloc enters the battlefield, it fights up to one target creature an opponent controls. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTvU04n4dVo

item.title: [40k] Malanthrope
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Flying

Scavenge the Dead — When Malanthrope enters the battlefield, exile target player's graveyard. Put a +1/+1 counter on Malanthrope fro each creature card exiled this way.

item.title: [40k] Gargoyle Flock
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid Gargoyle

Flying

Skyswarm — At the beginning of your end step, if a creature entered the battlefield under your control this turn, create a 1/1 blue Tyranid Gargoyle creature token with flying.

item.title: [40k] Tervigon
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Ravenous (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.)

Trample

Spawn Termagant — Whenever Tervigon deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Tyranid creature tokens.

item.title: [40k] Termagant Swarm
item.description:
Creature — Tyranid

Ravenous (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.)

Death Frenzy — When Termagant Swarm dies, create a number of 1/1 green Tyranid creature tokens equal to Termagant Swarm's power.

Flash

item.title: [40k] Hull Breach
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Destroy target artifact.

• Destroy target enchantment.

• Destroy target artifact and target enchantment.

item.title: [40k] Herald's Horn
item.description:
Artifact

As Herald's Horn enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Creature spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.

At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card of the chosen type, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.

item.title: [40k] Harrow
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [40k] Game Trail
item.description:
Land

As Game Trail enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, Game Trail enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

item.title: [40k] Frontier Bivouac
item.description:
Land

Frontier Bivouac enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {R}.

item.title: [40k] Farseek
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.description:
Land

{T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

item.title: [40k] Death's Presence
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature you control dies, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the power of the creature that died.

item.title: [40k] Cultivate
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [40k] Cinder Glade
item.description:
Land — Mountain Forest

({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)

Cinder Glade enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Cave of Temptation: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [40k] Bred for the Hunt
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

item.title: [40k] Aetherize
item.description:
Instant

Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

Land

item.title: [40k] Path of Ancestry
item.description:
Land

Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}{G}.
